content: What do you need to configure on a profile to allow it to find duplicate records?
options: A. View All
B. Delete
C. Read and Edit
D. Merge
title: Question 1

content: What is NOT a feature of CRM Content Packs?
options: A. A content pack can contain a collection of related documents
B. A content pack can include any file from inside CRM content
C. If individual documents are updated the content pack can also be updated
D. CRM Content requires a feature license,
title: Question 2

content: Which deployment tool can be used to delete metadata from an organization? (choose 2 answers)
options: A. Force.com Migration Tool
B. Unmanaged packages
C. Change sets
D. Force.com IDE
title: Question 3

content: Which three actions can occur when an administrators clicks "save" after making a number of changes to Knowledge data categories in a category group and changing their position in the hierarchy? Choose three.
options: A. The contents of category drop-down menu change
B. The articles and questions visible to users change
C. Users are temporarily locked out of the ability to access articles
D. Users may temporarily experience performance issues when searching for articles
E. The history of article usage is reset to zero utilization
title: Question 4

content: Which of the following are some of the capabilities of a Live Agent?
options: A. Knowledge chatlet and the Articles tool
B. Skills
C. All of the above
D. Pre-Chat Forms and Post-Chat Pages
E. Live Agent Chat Queues
title: Question 5

content: A Sales manager wants to implement a new B2B wherein when an opportunity is closed, it will add the name of the Account to the opportunity name
options: A. Create Approval process to add account and opportunity
B. Use Rollup Summary field to concatenate
C. Use Apex trigger to add the Account name to the Opportunity name
D. Use validation to update the field
E. Create a workflow field update to concatenate Account name and Opportunity name
title: Question 6

content: What type of data can be migrated between environments using change sets? Choose 2 answers
options: A. Account team roles
B. Field type changes
C. Email templates
D. Custom fields
title: Question 7

content: All enabled on Accounts and assign to the new users45. SFB Industries are looking to set up Entitlements in Salesforce. What is the first thing you must do in Salesforce when setting this up?
options: A. Choose an Entitlement Model
B. Set Up Milestones
C. Setup Milestone Actions
D. Create an Entitlement Process
title: Question 8

content: Salesforce Knowledge offers the ability to store PowerPoint files, PDFs, office documents, and any other type of file with no restriction on size or length.
options: A. False
B. True
title: Question 9

content:
James, a recruiting manager needs a picklist field implemented on the Position object done by the end of the week. Matt, the system administrator was too busy to fulfill the requirement.
What should Matt do, to prevent this from happening again?
options: A. Changed OWD for the Position Object to Public Read/Write.
B. Delegate James as a delegated administrator for the Position Object
C. Delegate James as a delegated administrator for the Recruiting App
D. Assign James with the "Modify All Data" permission set
title: Question 10

content: The administrator for SFB Industries would like to deploy a custom object and fields to an unrelated Org. What is the best way to do this using declarative functionality?
options: A. Unmanaged package
B. Change Sets
C. Force.com Migration Tools
D. Force.com IDE
title: Question 11

content: What actions can you add to a milestone (3)
options: A. Success actions
B. Warning actions
C. Repeat actions

D. Violation actions
         Success actions
         Warning actions
         Violation actions
title: Question 12

content: What must be considered in Communities for internal and external users. External users are using chatter. Choose 2
options: A. Use Ideas, Q&A
B. New Users should use Customer portal and partner portal instead of community
C. External and Internal users should be on different community
D. You need to enable Chatter
title: Question 13

content: Suggest a feature that SFB Industries can enable to increase call deflection.
options: A. Click--to--dial
B. Email--to--Case
C. Public Knowledge Base
D. Live Chat
title: Question 14

content: What would you check to see whether a workflow failed?
options: A. debug log
B. workflow log
C. integration log
D. failed work flow log
title: Question 15

content: See the 4-week moving average of the number of new cases (1)
options: A. custom report type
B. dashboard filter
C. bucket field
D. cross filter
E. PREVGROUPVAL function
F. reporting snapshot
title: Question 16

content:
A sales manager would like access to the following:
All closed/won opportunities in the last six months for each account the manager owns.
All cases created within the last six months for each account the manager owns.
What can the administrator create to meet these requirements ?
options: A. Create a custom report type to combine the data into a single report.
B. Create an Account report that groups by both opportunities and cases.
C. Create a single report using the Joined Reports feature.
D. Create an Account report and add Opportunity and Case cross filters.
title: Question 17

content: While working with a report a Sales Manager at SFB Industries would like to see the % that each opportunity is contributing to the overall pipeline. How can this be achieved?
options: A. Create a formula field on the opportunity and include this in the report
B. Create a custom summary formula and use the PREVGROUPVAL function
C. Create a custom summary formula and use the PARENTGROUPVAL function
D. Create a formula field on the opportunity that uses the PARENTGROUPVAL function. Include this in the report
title: Question 18

content: SFB Industries are offering standard lower prices to some of their key accounts. How can this be reflected within Products/Price books?
options: A. Add a discounted price to the existing products inside of Salesforce
B. Create a custom field on the product object where you can enter the lower price
C. Create a new price book and add the relevant products
D. Add new products into Salesforce with lower prices
title: Question 19

content: Universal Containers wants only users from the sales department to have access to price books. How can an administrator meet this requirement?
options: A. Clone all custom price books from the standard price book.
B. Set the organization-wide default for price book to Use.
C. Manually share each price book to the sales users roles.
D. Create a sharing rule to share all price books to sales users.
title: Question 20

content: Assuming that the training sandbox will contain approximately 500MB of production data and be refreshed after daily training sessions, which type of sandbox can be used to train users on new functionality that has recently been deployed to production?
options: A. Developer Pro Sandbox
B. Developer Sandbox
C. Partial Data Sandbox
D. Full Sandbox
title: Question 21

content: SFB Industries needs to use two Custom Objects Shipments & Shipment items. Every time a Shipment item is marked as packed, it needs to trigger a field update on the master shipment record. What kind of relationship and feature needs to be present for this to work?
options: A. Lookup--relationship with a roll--up summary field
B. Master--detail relationship with a roll--up summary field
C. Lookup--relationship with a cross object field update
D. Master--detail relationship with a cross object field update
title: Question 22

content: The VP of Finance wants to ensure that once an opportunity is closed, it cannot be modified by any user. How can an administrator meet this requirement?
options: A. Create an opportunity validation rule with the formula: PRIORVALUE( IsClosed ) = True.
B. Set the Do Not Modify Closed Opportunity permission for all profiles.
C. Create a workflow field update to update the IsClosed field to True if a closed opportunity is modified.
D. Set all fields to Read-Only on the standard Closed Opportunity page layout.
title: Question 23

content: A user with permissions to create price books wants to quickly create a new product with the same information as the existing product by cloning the product. What is an important consideration when cloning a product?
options: A. Price book entries in price books that you don't have sharing access to aren't created.
B. Price book entries need to be activated before users can use the new price book.
C. Price book entries will not be created in the standard price book.
D. Price book entries in price books that you don't have sharing access to are created.
title: Question 24

content: How can you display a dynamic traffic light style image (Red Amber, Green) on the Lead Object, depending on a custom Lead Score field?
options: A. Use a formula field with the IMAGE() function
B. Create an Image field and set a default formula using the IMAGE() function
C. Create a workflow rule to automatically update a custom field with the relevant image
D. Enable the Lead Score image field
title: Question 25

content: A user has asked the Administrator at SFB Industries if they should have access to the salary field on the user object they should not. The Administrator has checked their profile and they do not have access to this field on field level security. Where else should they check?
options: A. Profile Object settings
B. Permission Sets
C. Sharing Rules
D. Org--wide defaults
title: Question 26

content: How to create a report showing Company growth Year after Year. What function to use ?
options: A. DATEVAL
B. PREVGROUPVAL
C. PARENTGROUPVAL
D. PRIORVALUE
title: Question 27

content:
An administrator would like to convert a Master-Detail relationship to a Lookup relationship. What actions should be taken prior to converting the relationship?
 Discuss
options: A. Select the Allow Reparenting option on the master-detail relationship.
B. Remove child object related lists from the parent object page layouts.
C. Delete all roll-up summaries that reference the detail object prior to converting,
D. Delete all reports that use the master object with the detail object report type.
title: Question 28

content:
A user has pore with read-only permissions for the case object.
How can the user be granted edit permission for cases?
options: A. Create a public group with edit permissions for the case object.
B. Create a sharing rule on the case object with read/write level of access.
C. Add the user in a role hierarchy above the users with edit permissions on the case object.
D. Create permission set with edit permissions for the case object.
title: Question 29

content: When importing revenue quota data for Collaborative Forecasts using Data Loader what information must be included in the import file? (3)
options: A. Quota quantity
B. Start date of the forecast period
C. Quota amount
D. User record ID
E. User full name
title: Question 30

content: What tool would you use if you wanted to create a report that would compare results over time based on specific criteria?
options: A. Exception Report
B. custom report types (CRT)
C. Standard Report
D. analytic snapshots
title: Question 31

content: The Organization Wide Defaults for SFB Industries on Accounts is set to Private. Because of an acquisition new sales users are going to start using Salesforce but need to see all Accounts. How can this be reflected in Salesforce?
options: A. Set Accounts Org--wide defaults to Public read/write
B. Create a new profile with View All enabled on Accounts and assign to the new users
C. Set Accounts Org--wide defaults to Public
D. Create a permission set with View All enabled on Accounts and assign to the new users
title: Question 32

content:
Universal Containers uses Enterprise Territory Management to manage its sales territories. The sales managers want to see who the account is manually shared outside of territory rules.
How can the system administrator meet this requirement?
options: A. Add the "Users in Assigned Territories" related list to the sales page layout
B. Add "Assign Territories" permission to the sales manager's profile
C. Add the "Assigned Territories" related list to the sales page layout
D. Add "Manage Territories" permission to the sales manager's profile
title: Question 33

content: The marketing department at Universal Containers regularly changes the page layout requirements for its customer marketing objects. The VP of Marketing has asked the administrator for permission to configure only these objects. What can the administrator do to meet this request?
options: A. Grant the VP of Marketing the ability log in as a user who is an administrator.
B. Create a custom profile with the Edit permissions on the custom marketing objects and assign to the VP of Marketing
C. Enable Marketing User permission on the user record for the VP of Marketing.
D. Setup the VP of Marketing as a delegated administrator for the custom marketing objects.
title: Question 34

content:
At Universal Containers, Organization-Wide Defaults (OWD) for Cases has been set to Public Read Only. A custom object calls Audits has a master-detail relationship to the Case object. Audit records should be accessible by the members of the Oversight Team only. A Public Group for the Oversight Team has been created.
What two next steps should the administrator tale to meet this requirement?
options: A. Create a sharing rule that gives the public group Read/Write access to Audits.
B. Remove create, read, edit and delete permissions to the Audits object for all profiles.
C. Set OWD to private for Cases and assign the public group a role Support Users in the hierarchy.
D. Build a permission set with create, read, and edit Audits selected and assign it to the individual public group members.
title: Question 35

content:
What type of process can the system administrator set for an organization's products?
Choose 3 answers
options: A. Standard prices
B. Product prices
C. Discount prices
D. List prices
E. Sales prices
title: Question 36

content: SFB Industries operates in a highly regulated industry. Recently a key bit of information has been changed from a customers record. How can this be audited in the future?
options: A. Field History Tracking
B. Setup Audit Trail
C. Login History
D. Debug Logs
title: Question 37

content: SFB Industries have set their Sales users profiles to read only on cases. But they have recently created a sharing rule that grants all sales users write access. What is true about the sales users level of access?
options: A. They can only edit cases if they are the owner of the account
B. They cannot edit cases
C. They can edit cases
D. They can only edit cases if they are the owner of the case
title: Question 38

content: What permissions must be enabled on a profile to find duplicate records?
options: A. Delete
B. Read and Edit
C. View All Data
D. Locate Duplicate Records
E. Merge
title: Question 39

content:
An Administrator has been asked to grant read, create and edit access to the product object for users who currently have the standard marketing user profile.
Which two approaches could be used to meet this request? Choose 2 answers.
options: A. Change the access levels in the marketing user standard profile to read, create and edit for the product object
B. Create a permission set with read and write access for the product object and assign it to the marketing users
C. Create a permission set with read, create and edit access for the product object and assign it to the marketing users
D. Create a new profile for the marketing users and change the access levels to read, create and edit for the product object
title: Question 40

content: A custom object was created in Universal Containers only system administrator has CRED. Access needs to be extended to VP and Standard User? choose 2
options: A. Add CRED to VP and Standard User profile
B. Permission Set for VP and Standard User
C. Give "modify all" to both VP and Standard User
D. Create a custom profile and add VP and Standard User
title: Question 41

content: You can cancel pending actions in the entitlement process queue.
options: A. False
B. True
title: Question 42

content: Agents can file vacation leave request that must be approved by the manager. An agent is unable to submit the request. What could be the possible cause?
options: A. There is error in Approval Process
B. Approval process is not activated for him
C. Agent's manager is inactive
D. He is not Manager of any User
title: Question 43

content:
An administrator notices that there are two account records in the system with the same name.
A contact record with the same name is associated with each account. Using the salesforce Merge Feature, what steps steps should be taken to merge these accounts ?
options: A. Merge the duplicate contacts, and then merge the duplicate accounts.
B. Merge the duplicate accounts, and check the that optionally merges the duplicate contacts.
C. Merge the duplicate accounts, and then merge the duplicate contacts.
D. Merge the duplicate accounts, and then the duplicate contacts will be merged automatically.
title: Question 44

content:
How can an administrator improve the relevance of search results for support agents searching for knowledge articles to solve articles?
Choose 3 answers
options: A. Enable feed tracking on all relevant article types.
B. Define synonyms for common search terms.
C. Pre-populate article search filters based on the values of case fields.
D. Create data categories and assign articles to each category.
E. Create a record type for each data category.
title: Question 45

content: A system administrator has unchecked the setting "Enable Content Pack Creation". What can users do with content packs? Choose 1.
options: A. hindi ko alam
B. Edit description and title of existing content packs
C. Modify existing content packs.
D. All content Packs will be deleted.
title: Question 46

content: SFB Industries have two custom objects in a master--detail relationship Total Payments & Daily Payments. If more than 3 daily payment records are added to a total payment record, a notification needs to be sent to the operations manager. How can this be achieved?
options: A. Create a cross object formula field in combination with a workflow rule and email alert
B. Use a roll--up summary field in combination with a workflow rule and email alert
C. Setup a workflow rule with an email alert
D. Create an Apex Trigger on Total Payments
title: Question 47

content: A sales manager is receiving an "insufficient privileges" error when viewing a contact. The contact owner is under the manager in the role hierarchy. What is the reason the sales manager is not able to view the contact?
options: A. The contact owner has not selected the option to share contacts with others in the role hierarchy.
B. The contact sharing settings are private, so access to the record is limited to the contact owner and system administrator.
C. The account sharing settings are controlled by the parent, and the account owner is not under the sales manger's role.
D. The contact sharing settings are controlled by the parent, and the account owner is not under the sales manager's role.
title: Question 48

content: What can a Sales Representative see once he clicks on the Forecast (Collaborative) tab? Select 4
options: A. Data Source
B. Forecast Range
C. Quotas
D. Forecast Categories
E. Opportunity list column
title: Question 49

content: What permission do you need enabled to see the Find Duplicates button?
options: A. Delete
B. View All Data
C. Merge
D. Read, Edit
title: Question 50

content: During Deployment from Sandbox to production using Change set, Few components missed. How you are going to add those component to production ?
options: A. Edit Changset and re-deploy
B. Clone existing and make changes and Re-deploy
C. Create New and Redeploy
title: Question 51

content: Choose the Forecast schedule type that is a revenue projection that can be expressed in dollar amount, units of product family, or both.
options: A. Forecast
B. Quota
C. Pipeline
title: Question 52

content: Dylan has submitted a vacation request for approval by his manager, but the manager is not receiving any email alerts. What can you use in order to troubleshoot the issue? Choose two answers.
options: A. Email log
B. A Time-Based Workflow
C. The Setup Audit Trail
D. Debug Log
title: Question 53

content: The administrator of Universal Containers is testing an approval process in a recently refreshed Developer Pro sandbox and is finding that none of the notification emails are being sent to the approvers. Which two reasons could be the cause?Choose 2 Answers
options: A. The email addresses for the users are incorrect.
B. Workflow emails only work in Full sandboxes.
C. HTML templates are not available in sandboxes.
D. The Deliverability Access Level setting is incorrect.
title: Question 54

content:
Universal Containers uses a custom object to track services called Work Items with a lookup to Accounts. The Work Item records should only be visible by users that own the Account records.
Which sharing setting provides the correct visibility?
options: A. Private
B. Public Read Only
C. Public Read/Went/Transfer
D. Controlled by Parent
title: Question 55

content: Universal Containers plans to migrate its existing knowledge base into Salesforce Lightining Knowledge. Which two statements must be considered? Choose 2 answers.
options: A. Each article must be associated to a record type
B. Approval process history migrate to Lightning Knowledge
C. Classic Knowledge Attachments are moved to the files related list
D. Article numbers change during migration
title: Question 56

content:
SFB Industries have started to make use of Collaborative
Forecasts & Quotas. How can the Administrators upload
Quota data into Salesforce? (Select 2)
options: A. Use the Quota uploader under setup
B. Add Quotas with the API
C. Add Quotas with the Data Loader
D. Add Quotas manually on the Quota Object
title: Question 57

content: What password option is available for the administrator to set on content deliveries? Choose 3
options: A. Password protection is optional and defaults to ON
B. Administrator provided default password
C. Password protection is required
D. Password protection is optional and defaults to OFF
E. Password complexity rules
title: Question 58

content: How can content types be used in CRM Content? (Choose two answers.)
options: A. With library rules, to limit the number of libraries created.
B. With validation rules, to capture complete data.
C. With upload rules, to limit the size of content files.
D. With content fields, to control the content detail page layout.
title: Question 59

content:
Milestone actions determine what happens during a case support process and can trigger what type of workflow actions?
Select 3
options: A. Entitlement Breach
B. Violation
C. SLA Breach
D. Warning
E. Success
title: Question 60

content:
What are two capabilities of Enterprise Territory Management?
Choose 2 answers.
options: A. The ability to use 20 territories assignment rules per model
B. Prioritize territories to indicate highest priority or lowest priority
C. The ability to use filter-based opportunity criteria to expand assignment rules
D. Territory hierarchy replaces the role hierarchy for sharing
title: Question 61

content: The inside sales manager at Universal Containers wants to be able to report on how long leads have a Lead Status of "Open" before the status changes to another value. Additionally, the sales team has requested the status value be changed with fewer clicks. What should the administrator do to meet this requirement?
options: A. Use a formula field to calculate the difference between the current and created data when the status changes through inline editing.
B. Use a quick action to change the status value and a workflow rule to update a date field.
C. Use a workflow rule that sends an email when the Lead Status is changed and an approval process to update the status.
D. Turn on field history tracking for the lead status field and create a report based on that field.
title: Question 62

content:
The best practice when creating Profiles is to:
Select one:
options: A. Start with a blank profile and customize it to what you need.
B. Clone one of the built in standard profiles that is close to what you need
C. Use one profile for all users.
D. Edit one of the existing built in profiles.
title: Question 63

content: An administrator wants to allow users who are creating leads to have access to the Find Duplicates button. What lead object-level permission will the administrator need to provide these users?
options: A. Read and Edit
B. View All
C. Delete
D. Merge
title: Question 64

content: Select an option below that you would use to limit the number of records and assist with data consistency.
options: A. Record types and page layouts
B. Custom lookup fields and lookup filters
C. Picklist and dependent picklist fields
D. Custom formula fields
E. Workflow field updates
title: Question 65

content:
SFB Industries are tightening up their forecasting procedure. Sales Managers would now like to see a submission of each users forecast at the end of each week.
Which feature will allow you to do this?
options: A. Collaborative Forecasting
B. Customizable Forecasting
title: Question 66

content: Which of the following is NOT true about article types in Salesforce Knowledge?
options: A. Article Types should enable 'actionable' content.
B. An organization must have 2 article types to enable Knowledge.
C. Article Types may include attachments.
D. Article Types are typically short HTML documents.
title: Question 67

content: System admin - wants to make sure that when an opportunity is closed - nobody can modify it.
options: A. validation rule with priorvalue(isclosed) = true
B. Change OWD setting read / write
C. give read only permission on close opportunity
D. create workflow (isclosed) is true - if customer modifies it
title: Question 68

content: Which forecasting schedule type would you use if you wanted a benchmark of how much should be sold within a certain time frame?
options: A. Forecast
B. Quota
C. Pipeline
title: Question 69

content:
When removing test data from a new Developer Org using Mass Delete Records, why is it necessary to Mass Delete Accounts as the last step.
Select one:
options: A. They must be done in reverse alphabetical order
B. It's an internal Salesforce requirement
C. The order does not matter
D. Related child records exist
title: Question 70

content: Which value rolls up for both customizable and collaborative forecasting?
options: A. Quota
B. Amount
C. Opportunity amount
D. Expected revenue
title: Question 71

content: In a two-step approval process where the first step is a hiring manager and second is the appropriate director, which of the following relationship types would a system administrator use to establish a relationship between the two approvers?
options: A. Sibling relationship
B. Look up relationship
C. Hierarchical relationship
D. Master detail relationship
title: Question 72

content: The administrator at Universal Containers wants to improve data quality by ensuring that all accounts have a Billing State/Province based upon the Billing Postal Code for that account. How can this be achieved? Choose 2 answers
options: A. Use a trigger that populates Billing State/Province based on a custom object that maps postal codes to states/provinces
B. Use validation rule to do a VLOOKUP of the Billing Postal Code to a custom object that maps postal codes to states/provinces
C. Use a workflow that populates Billing State/Province based on a custom object that maps postal codes to states/provinces
D. Use validation rule to do an HLOOKUP of the Billing Postal Code to a custom object that maps postal codes to states/provinces
title: Question 73

content:
When can a user become an owner of a record without being a record creator?
Choose 2 answers.
options: A. If the record is in a queue
B. If person is above the owner of the record in role hierarchy
C. If he is already a record owner
D. if someone shares the record to the record owner
title: Question 74

content: To set up entitlement management, including milestones, entitlement processes, and entitlement templates which two permissions need to be enabled?Choose 2 answers
options: A. Manage Entitlements
B. Customize Entitlements
C. Manage Milestones
D. Customize Application
title: Question 75

content: Which of the following is true about the Salesforce Console for Sales? (Choose 3 answers)
options: A. To assign Sales Console access permission, you must edit the user record.
B. An add-on license is required for each user who needs to access the console.
C. To activate the sales console, it is necessary to check the Sales Console permission checkbox in the appropriate permission set.
D. Edit user profiles to assign this license to a group of users.
E. It is necessary to edit the user record to assign this license to a user.
title: Question 76

content: When using Customizable Forecasts, which forecast category is not included in the forecast?
options: A. Omitted
B. Pipeline
C. Best Case
D. Closed
title: Question 77

content: Salesforce Knowledge offers administrators the ability to fully customize the way an article type displays to an end user.
options: A. True
B. False
title: Question 78

content: Both a sharing rule and an account team give Jose access to the Dixon Chemical account. The sharing rule gives him read access, and the account team gives him read/write access. Will Jose be able to edit the Dixon Chemical account?
options: A. Yes
B. No
title: Question 79

content: Which permission do you need to manage entitlements? Choose 2
options: A. Manage Entitlements
B. Customize Application"
C. Customize Entitlement
D. Manage Application
title: Question 80

content: System Administrator has been asked to create a field on the Opportunity object that will total the invoice amount field for all the invoices associated to the Opportunity. How should this be accomplished? - TROVARE LE RISPOSTE
options: A. Create a master detail relationship between invoices and opportunities and a Roll-Up Summary field on the Opportunity object
B. Create a master detail relationship between invoices and opportunities and a workflow rule that will display total on the Opportunity
C. Create a lookup relationship between invoices and opportunities and a workflow rule that will display total on the Opportunity
D. Create a lookup relationship between invoices and opportunities and a Roll-Up Summary field on the Opportunity object
title: Question 81

content:
UC needs to use different a pricebook for sales representatives in US, LATAM, EMEA and APAC.
What should the system administrator do? Choose 1.
options: A. Clone standard Pricebook and assigned separate prices for each region
B. delete standard pricebook and create pricebooks
title: Question 82

content:
The administrator at Universal Containers has been asked to create an account management dashboard displaying opportunities and activities for each of its top five clients.
Which dashboard feature should the Administrator use to meet this requirement?
options: A. Joined reports on a dashboard
B. Dynamic dashboard
C. Dashboard Filter
D. Matrix reports on a dashboard
title: Question 83

content: Which feature is required to use Territory Management?
options: A. Collaborative Forecasting
B. Advanced Currency Management
C. Multiple Currencies
D. Customizable Forecasting
title: Question 84

content: The VP of Sales wants to require that the Next Step Field is always updated when an opportunity stage is changed. How can this process be automated?
options: A. Create a validation rule with the following formula: AND( ISCHANGED(ISPICKVAL(StageName)), NOT(ISCHANGED(NextStep)))
B. Create a validation rule with the following formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), NOT(ISCHANGED(NextStep))
C. Create a workflow rule with the following formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), NOT(ISCHANGED(NextStep))
D. Create a workflow rule with the following formula: AND( ISCHANGED(ISPICKVAL(StageName)), NOT(ISCHANGED(NextStep))
title: Question 85

content: Which of the following statements are true about an end user's forecast? (Select 3)
options: A. This aggregate can be units of product
B. Rolls up according to the forecast hierarchy
C. This aggregate can be dollars of revenue
D. It is updated in the system every evening at 5 pm
title: Question 86

content: How can you ensure that when people are entering State Country information it is standardised across the entire business?
options: A. Install a third party AppExchange app
B. Make the relevant fields required on the page layout
C. Build a validation rule that only lets the correct country/state name be entered.
D. Enable State & Country picklists feature
title: Question 87

content: Universal Containers has four sales regions: North America, APAC, EMEA, and LATAM. Each sales region is led by a VP of Sales. Each of the VPs wants to have a dashboard emailed to them every Monday morning that contains components with only the data for their region. How can an administrator meet this requirement?
options: A. Create a separate dashboard with data specific to each sales VP, scheduled to be delivered on Monday mornings.
B. Create one dashboard that includes a filter for each region, scheduled to be delivered on Monday mornings.
C. Create one dashboard using Visualforce to create a filter, scheduled to be delivered on Monday mornings.
D. Create a reporting snapshot and check the dashboard option, scheduled to be delivered on Monday mornings.
title: Question 88

content:
The administrator uses Process Builder to update a field when certain criteria in the record are met. This field has Field Level Security (FLS) set on it and the "Appointment Setting" users cannot see the field on their page layouts. What will happen when one of the Appointment Setters updates a record to meet the desired criteria?
Select one:
options: A. The field will fail to update and there will not be a message displayed.
B. The user will receive an error indicating they do not have access to update the field.
C. The field update will still occur even though the users cannot see it. Even though the users cannot see the field, it does not stop the field update from occurring.
D. The field will not update when these users trigger the update but it will trigger for other users who can see the field.
title: Question 89

content: Some users across the business in various departments need the ability to export reports. Which feature will best grant access to these users?
options: A. Enable the Export Reports permission on their existing profiles
B. Create a permission set with the Export Reports permission and assign it to the relevant users
C. Create a new profile with the Export Reports permission
D. Use Delegated Administration and assign it to the relevant users
title: Question 90

content:
Universal Containers support team needs to track service level agreements for customers.
Today, they manually look up contacts by name when a customer calls. How can the administrator automate this process?
options: A. Configure a workflow rule that sends and email alert of old cases to the support manager.
B. Enable Case Feed and add a Contracts custom publisher to the Case Feed layout.
C. Create a private Chatter group for customers with high-priority service level agreements.
D. Enable entitlements and add the tab for entitlements and service contracts.
title: Question 91

content: What is NOT a feature of Custom Report Types?
options: A. Select which fields appear as columns by default
B. Add fields to the report type via lookups
C. Remove reorder and rename fields
D. Add default filters
title: Question 92

content:
An administrator has uploaded a change set from a sandbox to a production organization and would like to add a missing component to the change set before deployment.
What option does the administrator have to modify the change set? Choose 2 answers.
options: A. Edit the change set in the sandbox environment and upload it to production.
B. Clone the change set in the sandbox environment, add the component and upload it to production
C. Create a new change set in the sandbox environment, add all the required components and upload it to productionD. Edit the change set in production, add the component, and use the redeploy option.
title: Question 93

content: Universal Containers has four sales region: North America, APAC, EMEA, and LATAM. Each sales region is led by a VP of sales. Each of the VPs wants to have a dashboard emailed to them every IT Monday morning that contains components with only the data for their region. How can an administrator meet this requirement?
options: A. Create a reporting snapshot and check the dashboard option, scheduled to be delivered on Monday mornings
B. Create one dashboard using Visualforce to create a filter, scheduled to be delivered on Monday mornings
C. Create a separate dashboard with data specific to each sales VP, scheduled to be delivered on Monday mornings
D. Create one dashboard that includes a filter for each region, scheduled to be delivered on Monday mornings
title: Question 94

content: What statements are true regarding Territory Management? Choose 2.
options: A. Users in a territory can view, edit, transfer and delete all opportunities associated with accounts in the territory, regardless of who owns the opportunities.

B. Users in a territory can view, edit, transfer, and delete Opportunities assigned to the territory.o Users in a territory can view all opportunities associated with accounts in the territory, regardless of who owns the opportunities.
C. Users in a territory can view, edit and delete all opportunities associated with accounts in the territory, regardless of who owns the opportunities.
D. Users in a territory can view, edit, transfer, and delete accounts assigned to the territory.
title: Question 95

content:
To set the default level of access for users to be able to access each other's records, you would use:
Select one:
options: A. Sharing Rules.
B. Organization Wide Defaults.
C. Territory Management
D. The Role Hierarchy.
title: Question 96

content: SFB Industries have a requirement to see how many cases are open at any one time over the year. How can this be achieved?
options: A. Scheduled Reports
B. Exception Reports
C. Custom Report Types
D. Analytical Snapshots
title: Question 97

content:
If my boss is always traveling and rarely brings his computer (because he loves his Android tablet), how can I make it convenient for the CEO to approve requests from his organization?
Choose 2 answers.
options: A. Enable email approval
B. Enable chatter feed approval
C. Enable Mobile Lite for Approval Processes
D. Enable SMS/IM approval
title: Question 98

content: Noah wants a report that shows how many cases and closures for all of his subordinates at 6PM each day. How can you configure this?
options: A. Use a dynamic dashboard for all subordinates
B. Use a dynamic dashboard and specify each individual
C. Use a single dashboard and apply cross filters
D. Use a single dashboard with an Analytic Snapshot
title: Question 99

content: What are the benefits of territory management? Choose 3 ANSWERS
options: A. Ability to include opportunity in more than one record.
B. Ability to generate account sharing rule based on territory membership
C. Support for multiple forecast per user based on territory membership
D. Support to complex and frequently changing sales organization
E. Ability to expand private sharing model using account criteria
title: Question 100

content: Users have been given Read/Write access to product support cases through criteria-based sharing rules. A user's profile only has read permission for cases.What can the user expect regarding their ability to edit product support cases?
options: A. The user will be able to edit product support cases.
B. The user will not be able to edit product support cases.
C. The user will only be able to edit the cases that they created.
D. The user will only be able to edit cases manually shared with them.
title: Question 101

content: Which three are capabilities of Collaborative Forecasting?
options: A. Forecast using opportunity splits
B. Select a default forecast currency setting
C. Rename categories
D. Overlay quota
E. Add categories
title: Question 102

content: The Forecast Category on the Opportunity record maps directly, on a one-to-one basis, to the aggregates on the Forecast tab.
options: A. False
B. True
title: Question 103

content: Managers wants to view a dashboard report without logging in to Salesforce and have the data sent via email weekly.
options: A. Create a report and dashboard from that report and schedule a weekly refresh and set an email to be sent to the manager
B. Create Dynamic Dashboard
C. Create Joint Report
D. Create an analytical snapshot weekly
title: Question 104

content: What things should be specified by the admin to deploy changes from Sandbox to Production org using Force.com IDE? Choose 3
options: A. Username and password
B. Configuration that needs to be transferred
C. Change set connection settings
D. Data to be included
E. Environment where changes will be transferred
title: Question 105

content: Universal Container has set the Organization Wide Defaults for all objects to private. Which profile setting would allow user to access all of the accounts within the organization? Choose 2 Answers
options: A. Read for Accounts
B. Modify All Data
C. View All for Accounts
D. Public for Accounts
title: Question 106

content: What are the three types of Milestone Actions that you can trigger when working with Entitlements? (Select 3)
options: A. Success Action
B. Completion Action
C. Starting Action
D. Violation Action
E. Warning Action
title: Question 107

content:
What are some of the limitations of Service Entitlements?
Select 3
options: A. Once activated and applied to a case, milestone actions cannot be updated or deleted.
B. Up to 100 entitlement processes can be created with up to 10 milestones each
C. Entitlement processes do not apply to cases created via web-to-case or email-to-case unless you create some custom code to add them.
D. Up to 1,000 entitlement processes can be created with up to 10 milestones each.
title: Question 108

content: SFB Industries is currently granting access to a number of users around the business to various reports and folders in Salesforce. They are currently granting access based on the specific users. Which feature in Salesforce can be used to make this more efficient?
options: A. Create a new profile for the users
B. Place all users in the same Role
C. Create a public group and add the users to it
D. Create a sharing rule and add the users to it
title: Question 109

content: On a monthly basis, an administrator would like to pull data related to service contracts from Salesforce to store elsewhere. Which two ways can an administrator accomplish this?Choose 2 answers
options: A. Configure the "Schedule Export" options under Data Export
B. Use the "Object Export" feature under Data Management
C. Use Data Exporter to export the data each month.
D. Use Data Loader to export the data each month.
title: Question 110

content: A Sales manager at SFB Industries would like to view the global company sales dashboard but be able to switch between a US EMEA & APAC view. How can this best be achieved?
options: A. Change the filters on the various reports
B. Use Dashboard filters
C. Use a Dynamic Dashboard to switch between regions
D. Clone the Dashboard and change the filters on the various reports
title: Question 111

content: Your organization's VP of Sales wants to automatically add the account name to an opportunity name once a record is saved. How can this be done?
options: A. Use validation to update the field
B. Enforce an opportunity naming guideline for Sales Reps
C. Create a Workflow Rule with an immediate workflow trigger to update the opportunity name field using concatenate
D. Use an Apex Trigger
title: Question 112

content: If an administrator uses the data loader to transfer ownership of account records, which two results can be expected?Choose 2 Answers.
options: A. All ownership-based sharing rules for the records are recalculated.
B. All account teams are removed from the records that are transferred.
C. All new owners are automatically notified of their new account ownership.
D. All manual sharing is removed from the records that are transferred.
title: Question 113

content:
Universal containers uses Salesforce to track job positions and applicants. Applicants can apply for multiple positions and positions will have multiple applicants. The company wants to ensure that if an applicant is deleted, all associations between the applicant and the position(s) that he or she has applied for are deleted.
How can this be accomplished?
options: A. Create a master detail relationship between applicants and positions with applicants as the master.
B. Create a lookup relationship between applicants and positions with applicants as the parent.
C. Create a many -to- many relationships using junction object with both positions and applicants as masters.
D. Create a custom object between applicants and positions with lookup fields on the junction to both the objects.
title: Question 114

content: What permission would you need to locate duplicate records that you do not own in a custom object?
options: A. Read, Edit
B. Delete
C. Merge
D. View All Data
title: Question 115
